The examples given are about teachers from different races, including Gen-Xers (born 1965-1977) and Zoomers (born 1980-2000). The user wants to know which professor is "checked out" because they either understand the subject well or just want an easy grade.

But considering the context about math being associated with certain groups, perhaps the Zoomer isn't from that group, so maybe it's not them.

Hmm, this is confusing. Maybe the safest answer is "Not enough information," since we don't know their specific backgrounds beyond their race or generation.
